remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 `My.Computer.Audio.Play` 和 `My.Computer.Audio.PlaySystemSound` 方法播放 .wav 声音文件和系统声音。You can use the `My.Computer.Audio.Play` and `My.Computer.Audio.PlaySystemSound` methods to play .wav sound files and system sounds. 有关详细信息，请参阅[播放声音](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/playing-sounds)。For more information, see [Playing Sounds](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/playing-sounds). ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|是No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|是No| ## Examples 当 `AudioPlayMode.Background` 指定时，`My.Computer.Audio.Play` 方法在后台播放指定的声音。The `My.Computer.Audio.Play` method plays the specified sound in the background when `AudioPlayMode.Background` is specified. remarks.format: ## Remarks `Play` 方法在 `location`、`data`中以字节数组的形式播放 .wav 声音文件，或在 `stream`中以流的形式播放。The `Play` method plays the .wav sound file stored as a file at `location`, as a byte array in `data`, or as a stream in `stream`. 如果使用只采用 `location` 参数的重载，则 `Play` 方法在后台播放声音。If the overload that takes only the `location` parameter is used, the `Play` method plays the sound in the background. 否则，`playMode` 参数确定如何播放声音。Otherwise, the `playMode` parameter determines how the sound will play. |`playMode`|说明Description| |-|-| |`AudioPlayMode.Background`|在后台播放声音。Plays the sound in the background. 该调用代码继续执行。The calling code continues to execute.| |`AudioPlayMode.BackgroundLoop`|直到调用 方法时，才会在后台播放声音。Plays the sound in the background until the method is called. 该调用代码继续执行。The calling code continues to execute.| |`AudioPlayMode.WaitToComplete`|播放声音并等待，直到其完成后，调用代码才会继续。Plays the sound and waits until it completes before the calling code continues.| 应用程序可通过背景播放在播放声音时执行其他代码。Background playing lets the application execute other code while the sound plays. 有关详细信息，请参阅[播放声音](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/playing-sounds)。For more information, see [Playing Sounds](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/playing-sounds). ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|是No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|是No| ## Examples 当 `PlayMode.Background` 指定时，`My.Computer.Audio.Play` 方法在后台播放指定的声音。The `My.Computer.Audio.Play` method plays the specified sound in the background when `PlayMode.Background` is specified. remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Audio.Stop` 方法会停止在后台中播放的、`My.Computer.Audio.Play` 方法启动的声音。The `My.Computer.Audio.Stop` method stops a sound playing in the background that was started by the `My.Computer.Audio.Play` method. 一般情况下，应用程序播放循环声音时，声音将在某个时间点停止。In general, when an application plays a looping sound, it should stop the sound at some point. 有关详细信息，请参阅[播放声音](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/playing-sounds)。For more information, see [Playing Sounds](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/playing-sounds). ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|是No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|是No| ## Examples 此示例使用 `My.Computer.Audio.Stop` 方法来停止当前正在播放的后台或循环声音，并使用 `My.Computer.Audio.Play` 方法在后台播放循环声音。This example uses the `My.Computer.Audio.Stop` method to stop the application currently playing background or looping sound and uses the `My.Computer.Audio.Play` method to play a looping sound in the background.
